title: Pete, Drinker of Blood
description: In part 2 of PETE, DRINKER OF BLOOD, reluctant vampire Pete Tyler is confronted by Carson Fitzgerald, the sinister vampire lord responsible for turning Pete and the other vampires in Hollywood. Given a terrifying ultimatum, Pete must deliver the message to the trendy vampires he loathes, but his affection for Angie, the cute — and quite human — bartender at The Starbucket, may be his undoing…Part 2 of an 8-part serial novel from author Scott S. Phillips (FRIDAY THE 13TH: CHURCH OF THE DIVINE PSYCHOPATH, SQUIRREL EYES, TALES OF MISERY AND IMAGINATION). New installments released every month.
author: Scott S. Phillips
